attributes.action: Stop the Home Office Deporting Al Bangura
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Al Bangura is a family man and taxpayer.As a pro-footballer he has been prominent in working in the community.If deported to Sierra Leone he faces death.

rejection.details: Individual cases are a matter for direct correspondence with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
